@JordanianFalcon of any hand?
@JordanianFalcon My Government has abolished the privileges of the Council. And provided a reform program devoid of any empty promises. And took unprecedented confidence.

@JordanianFalcon, which in my opinion means that the Council was convinced of a program and is not looking for self-benefits. The relationship of the government with the council must be as good as long
@JordanianFalcon The goal was to improve the life of the citizen. I do not mean only in the short term but in the long term
@JordanianFalcon The seven axes dealt with all this. Relay real problems even if street compression is not a solution.
Follow our rally live in front of the #Tours castle! http://t.co/pgyxgi1g # FH2012
Democracy must be stronger than markets! #Tours # FH2012
I am seriously left, but I am for a serious left! #Tours # FH2012
Today, it is the left who asks to take responsibility, after 10 years of right! #Tours # FH2012
I believe in the vital forces of our country, in all these associative activists, in all those organizations that devote themselves to others! #Tours
Judge the results, judge the projects and make your choice lucidly! #Tours # FH2012
I claim to be the head of state, not to be head of everything and responsible for anything. #Tours # FH2012
I never considered that the pastor or the priest could have an authority superior to that of the schoolmaster. #Tours # FH2012
We have assets, we can succeed! #Tours # FH2012
We need an ultimate goal: we must put the school of the Republic at the heart of our commitments. #Tours # FH2012
Everything will be done for youth employment. #Tours # FH2012
The hospital will no longer be considered as a company but as a public service! #Tours # FH2012
I will be the President of Justice restored. #Tours # FH2012
We need respect and exemplarity. #Tours # FH2012
I want to say to the French that change is also in practices and methods. #Tours # FH2012
We will make a new reform so that no individual can come to disturb the transparency of the financing of the policy. #Tours
We must give hope to our country. #Tours # FH2012
We will have to be bold! #Tours # FH2012
We are not in resistance, we are here to conquer, to advance, to find the path of progress! #Tours # FH2012
We have, again, rendezvous with victory! #Tours # FH2012
I heard the incumbent make compliments on the Left Front candidate! #Tours # FH2012
If you want to change, it's the first round you have to do it! #Tours # FH2012
My only weapon is you! #Tours # FH2012

It is in the last days of a presidential campaign that the future of the nation is determined. #Weight # FH2012
Let's be simple: the confrontation is between left and right! #Weight # FH2012
We must show that we can dominate the forces of finance! This is the challenge of this campaign. #Weight # FH2012
As I said at #Tours this morning, I'm seriously left, but for a serious left! #Weight # FH2012
Congratulations Senegal. Looking forward to working with H.E Macky Sall in the framework of the AU, the UN and for our two countries.
France must be united in this difficult moment. I will be tomorrow the President who will gather the French. #Weight # FH2012
We need confidence. This beautiful word of "confidence" that allows to give meaning to politics. #Weight # FH2012
The role of a leader is not to be head of everything but to be head of state. #Weight # FH2012
To be head of state is not to be leader of party, clan, caste. #Weight # FH2012
To be a head of state is to be able to give direction and to respect the powers. #Weight # FH2012
The moralization of political life must be a demand on the part of the next head of state. #Weight # FH2012
I will not abandon any child from France! #Weight # FH2012
Justice: this is what has been lacking for 5 years when all decisions were taken against this republican ideal! #Weight # FH2012
Young people are looking for a qualification, a job, a dignity and not a credit! #Weight # FH2012
The left is not just a refusal, a rejection. The left is a hope in trust, justice, respect. #Weight # FH2012
The next President of the Republic must be the guarantor of secularism. #Weight # FH2012
Expulsions of Islamist preachers are announced. Why now? Why not before? Do not be impressed! #Blois
The police force has decreased in the last five years! #Weight # FH2012
The fight I am waging on your behalf today is the fight of my life. #Weight # FH2012
Continue the change process to the end! Consider that no vote is acquired until it has been pronounced. #Weight # FH2012
France has an appointment with history. History will do it with victory! #Weight # FH2012
